fullText: The Broadway version of 'Frozen' is a by-the-numbers stage adaptation that adds nothing meaningful to the Disney film on which it is based.
dtliExcerpt: The Broadway version of 'Frozen' is a by-the-numbers stage adaptation that adds nothing meaningful to the Disney film on which it is based.
